6.5 Working with the Project Package APIs - Reference Documentation

Authors: Microsoft Corporation

Version: 8.0.0

Table of Contents

6.1/r/project/package/list
6.2/r/project/package/attach
6.3/r/project/package/detach

6.5 Working with the Project Package APIs

The project package APIs facilitate R package dependency management for projects.
  • Retrieve a list of all packages loaded for a project using the /r/project/package/list call.
  • Load individual packages for a project using the /r/project/package/attach call.
  • Unload individual packages for a project using the /r/project/package/detach call.

6.5.1 /r/project/package/list

This call lists R package dependencies for the specified project.

HTTP Method

GET

Request Format

Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8

Parameters

  • format – specifies markup encoding on the call: json or xml
  • project – specifies the project identifier
  • installed - if true, the response lists all packages installed in the project environment

Examples 

format=json
project=PROJECT-4f9fe8bf-9425-4f2c-aa15-5d94818988f9

Response Markup (JSON)

{
    "deployr": {
        "response": {
            "call": "/r/project/package/list",
            "success": true,
            "project": {
                "name": "Demo Analysis",
                "project": "PROJECT-4f9fe8bf-9425-4f2c-aa15-5d94818988f9",
                "descr": "Predicting retail sales.",
                "longdescr": null,
                "author": "george",
                "authors": [
                    "george"
                ],
                "shared": false,
                "lastmodified": 1378321615345,
                "live": true,
                "cookie": null,
                "origin": "Project original."
            },
            "packages": [
                {
                    "status": "ok",
                    "attached": true,
                    "name": "base",
                    "version": "3.0.1",
                    "repo": "http://cran.us.r-project.org",
                    "descr": "The R Base Package"
                },
                {
                    "status": "ok",

                    "version": "3.0.1",
                    "repo": "http://cran.us.r-project.org",
                    "descr": "The R Graphics Package"
                },
                {
                    "status": "ok",
                    "attached": true,
                    "name": "grDevices",
                    "version": "3.0.1",
                    "repo": "http://cran.us.r-project.org",
                    "descr": "The R Graphics Devices and Support for Colours and Fonts"
                },
                {
                    "status": "ok",

                    "name": "methods",
                    "version": "3.0.1",

Response Markup (XML)

  <response>
    <success>true</success>
    <call>/r/project/package/list</call>

6.5.2 /r/project/package/attach

This call attaches R package dependencies for the specified project.

HTTP Method

POST

Request Format

Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8

Parameters

  • format – specifies markup encoding on the call: json or xml
  • project – specifies the project identifier
  • name - specifies a comma-separated list of R package names to attach
  • repo - (optional) specifies the R repository location for named packages

Examples 

format=json
project=PROJECT-4f9fe8bf-9425-4f2c-aa15-5d94818988f9
name=RevoScaleR

Response Markup (JSON)

{
    "deployr": {
        "response": {
            "call": "/r/project/package/attach",
            "success": true,
            "project": {
                "name": "Demo Analysis",
                "project": "PROJECT-4f9fe8bf-9425-4f2c-aa15-5d94818988f9",
                "descr": "Predicting retail sales.",
                "longdescr": null,
                "author": "george",
                "authors": [
                    "george"
                ],
                "shared": false,
                "lastmodified": 1378321615345,
                "live": true,
                "cookie": null,
                "origin": "Project original."
            },
            "packages": [
                {
                    "name": "RevoScaleR",
                    "status": "success",
                    "repo": null
                }
            ],
            "httpcookie": "B1B5673DC4A358407F83FD6725A8C0BF"
        }
    }
}

Response Markup (XML)

<deployr>
  <response>
    <call>/r/project/package/attach</call>
    <success>true</success>
    <project>
      <project>PROJECT-4f9fe8bf-9425-4f2c-aa15-5d94818988f9</project>
      <name>Demo Analysis</name>
      <descr>Predicting retail sales.</descr>
      <longdescr/>
      <author>george</author>
      <authors>
        <author>george</author>
      </authors>
      <shared/>
      <lastmodified>1378321739728</lastmodified>
      <live>true</live>
      <cookie><![CDATA[  ]]></cookie>
      <origin>Project original.</origin>
    </project>
    <packages>
      <package>
        <name>RevoScaleR</name>
        <repo/>
        <status>success</status>
      </package>
    </packages>
  </response>
</deployr>

6.5.3 /r/project/package/detach

This call detaches R package dependencies for the specified project.

HTTP Method

POST

Request Format

Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8

Parameters

  • format – specifies markup encoding on the call: json or xml
  • project – specifies the project identifier
  • name - specifies a comma-separated list of R package names to detach

Examples 

format=json
project=PROJECT-4f9fe8bf-9425-4f2c-aa15-5d94818988f9
name=RevoScaleR

Response Markup (JSON)

{
    "deployr": {
        "response": {
            "call": "/r/project/package/detach",
            "success": true,
            "project": {
                "name": "Demo Analysis",
                "project": "PROJECT-4f9fe8bf-9425-4f2c-aa15-5d94818988f9",
                "descr": "Predicting retail sales.",
                "longdescr": null,
                "author": "george",
                "authors": [
                    "george"
                ],
                "shared": false,
                "lastmodified": 1378321615345,
                "live": true,
                "cookie": null,
                "origin": "Project original."
            },
            "packages": [
                {
                    "name": "RevoScaleR",
                    "status": "success",
                }
            ],
            "httpcookie": "B1B5673DC4A358407F83FD6725A8C0BF"
        }
    }
}

Response Markup (XML)

<deployr>
  <response>
    <call>/r/project/package/detach</call>
    <success>true</success>
    <project>
      <project>PROJECT-4f9fe8bf-9425-4f2c-aa15-5d94818988f9</project>
      <name>Demo Analysis</name>
      <descr>Predicting retail sales.</descr>
      <longdescr/>
      <author>george</author>
      <authors>
        <author>george</author>
      </authors>
      <shared/>
      <lastmodified>1378321739728</lastmodified>
      <live>true</live>
      <cookie><![CDATA[  ]]></cookie>
      <origin>Project original.</origin>
    </project>
    <packages>
      <package>
        <name>RevoScaleR</name>
        <status>success</status>
      </package>
    </packages>
  </response>
</deployr>
